select bo_no, b.bo_title, b.bo_Tag, t.tr_theme, i.change_name, b.bo_count from mytravel m join board b using(bo_no) join travel t using(bo_no) join img_file i using(bo_no) where m.member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from mytravel where bo_no=#{boNo} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where member_id=#{memberId} and ca_code=2

select c.course_no, bo_no, b.member_id, b.bo_title, c.course_name, c.course_day,i.change_name,c.course_distance from course c join board b using(bo_no) join img_file i using(bo_no) where member_Id=#{memberId} order by bo_no desc

select distinct bo_no,b.bo_title, r.reserve_price, r.reserve_total_person_cnt, r.check_in_date, r.check_out_date, r.reserve_name, i.change_name from hotel_Reservation r join img_file i using(bo_no) join board b using(bo_no) where r.member_id = #{memberId} and i.file_level = 1
